General_Description: '''Fire at Will''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens]] can't stand the [[Peloponnesian League|red tide]] that's spreading across [[Greece]] from [[Sparta]]. Burn them to ashes. Make them silent."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed Athenian [[Nation Leader|Leaders]] and [[soldier]]s, and destroyed Athenian Resource Crates all over Greece, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
